/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The highway is teeming with vehicles, predominantly in shades of white, black, and red, with a few blue and green ones adding a splash of color to the scene. The road itself is divided by a concrete barrier, ensuring the safety of the commuters. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes can be seen, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Above, the sky is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
